help.short: The name of the network manager connectivity configuration.
The name of the network manager.

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="appliesToGroups" required="True" identifiers="networkGroupId">
<prop type="array" name="hubs" identifiers="resourceId">

command.name: delete
command.confirmation: Are you sure you want to perform this operation?

help.short: The name of the network manager connectivity configuration.
The name of the network manager.
Deletes the resource even if it is part of a deployed configuration. If the configuration has been deployed, the service will do a cleanup deployment in the background, prior to the delete.

command.name: create

help.short: The name of the network manager connectivity configuration.
The name of the network manager.
